name: Sitcoms' Supporting Cast Quiz | Mixture: Comedy | 10 Questions

questions.text: On 'Empty Nest', who played Nurse Laverne?
On '3rd Rock From the Sun', who plays Leon?
questions.explanation:
Ian Lithgow.

	Yes, Leon is played by John Lithgow's son.

questions.text: On 'Charles in Charge', who played Charles' mother?
questions.explanation:
Ellen Travolta.

	Ellen is John Travolta's sister.

questions.text: On Night Court, which of the following never played the Public Defender?
questions.explanation:
Terry Kiser.

	Gail Strickland played the public defender in the pilot before being replaced byEllen Foley (who sang backup on Meatloaf's hit 'Paradise by the Dashboard Light') whowas replaced by Markie Post.  Terry Kiser is better remember as playing Bernie in the movie'Weekend at Bernie's'.

questions.text: On 'All in the Family', who played neighbor Irene Lorenzo?
questions.explanation:
Betty Garrett.

	She also played Mrs. Babich on 'Laverne and Shirley'.

questions.text: On 'The Jeffersons', who played George's mother?
Which of the following never played Chrissy Seaver on 'Growing Pains'?
questions.explanation:
Julie McCullough.

	Kelsey and Kirsten Dohring shared the role when Chrissy was a baby, then Ashley Johnson took over as a child.

questions.text: On 'The Brady Bunch', who played Cousin Oliver?
